q: Winners are not afraid of losing. But losers are. Failure is part of the process of success. People who avoid failure also avoid success.
If you pray for rain, be prepared to deal with some mud.
Patience is bitter, but its fruit is sweet.
You came empty handed, and you will leave empty handed.
Keep smiling, because life is a beautiful thing and there's so much to smile about.
The sun shines upon good and bad alike.
Muddy water is best cleared by leaving it alone.
What we know is a drop, what we don't know is an ocean.
Peace is not something you wish for; It's something you make, something you do, something you are, and something you give away.
Whatever you believe with feeling becomes your reality.
Believe in yourself. You are braver than you think, more talented than you know, and capable of more than you imagine.
Look to the beauty of this day, miracles are all around you.
Decide whether or not the goal is worth the risks involved. If it is, stop worrying.
He who fails to plan, plans to fail.
If you realize that you're the problem, then you can change yourself, learn something and grow wiser. Don't blame other people for your problems.
Life begins where fear ends.
Those who realize their folly are not true fools.
Throw your heart over the bar and your body will follow.
Successful people are not without problems. They're simply people who've learned to solve their problems.
Conscience is a man's compass.
Most of us live our lives by accident - we live as it happens. Fulfilment comes when we live our lives on purpose.
The day is for honest men, the night for thieves.
Happiness is not something ready made. It comes from your own actions.
If you see someone without a smile give them one of yours.
It's possible in ways both large or small to make a difference in someone's life.
You can only be afraid of what you think you know.
Don't ever be afraid to put yourself in a lesser position so that you can learn something from someone who knows more.
Make your stand today. On this spot. On this day.
Progress is impossible without change, and those who cannot change their minds cannot change anything.
Luck is a matter of preparation meeting opportunity.
The giving of love is an education in itself.
The purpose of life is to live it, to taste experience to the utmost, to reach out eagerly and without fear for newer and richer experience.
When you consider things like the stars, our affairs don't seem to matter very much, do they?
In order to control myself I must first accept myself by going with and not against my nature.
Work as though you would live forever, and live as though you would die today. Go another mile.
Each path to knowledge involves different rules and these rules are not interchangeable.
Everyone can rise above their circumstances and achieve success if they are dedicated to and passionate about what they do.
Continuous effort - not strength or intelligence - is the key to unlocking our potential.
There is no limit to the amount of good you can do if you don't care who gets the credit.
When you've got nothing, you've got nothing to lose.
Vision is the art of seeing things invisible.
The outer conditions of a person's life will always be found to reflect their inner beliefs.
The fewer the words, the better the prayer.
Only when one allows themself the right to die, do they then give yourself the permission to live.
True it is, we only hate those whom we do not know.
Spend eighty percent of your time focusing on the opportunities of tomorrow rather than the problems of yesterday.
Talk to someone about themselves and they'll listen for hours.
No great discovery was ever made without a bold guess.
If you can't, you must. If you must, you can.
I discovered a long time ago that if I helped enough people get what they wanted, I would always get what I wanted and I would never have to worry.
